skill1.name: slack-gif-creator
skill1.description: Toolkit for creating animated GIFs optimized for Slack, with validators for size constraints and composable animation primitives. This skill applies when users request animated GIFs or emoji animations for Slack from descriptions like "make me a GIF for Slack of X doing Y".

changes: Added validation, preview mode, and rollback for writes

jtbd.job: Toolkit for creating animated GIFs optimized for Slack, with validators for size constraints and composable animation primitives. This skill applies when users request animated GIFs or emoji animations for Slack from descriptions like "make me a GIF for Slack of X doing Y".

skill2.name: slack-gif-creator
skill2.description: Knowledge and utilities for creating animated GIFs optimized for Slack. Provides constraints, validation tools, and animation concepts. Use when users request animated GIFs for Slack like "make me a GIF of X doing Y for Slack."

description.description: Natural language description of the desired GIF animation (e.g., 'make me a bouncing star', 'animate a pulsing heart')

width.description: Width in pixels (128 for emoji, 480 for messages)

height.description: Height in pixels (128 for emoji, 480 for messages)

fps.description: Frames per second (lower = smaller file size)

colors.description: Optional array of hex color codes to use in the animation

optimize_for.description: Optimization target (emoji = max optimization, quality = minimal optimization)

uploaded_image.description: Optional path or URL to an uploaded image to use as source or inspiration

num_colors.description: Number of colors in the palette (fewer = smaller file size)

gif_path.description: Path to the generated GIF file

frame_count.description: Total number of frames in the animation

is_slack_ready.description: Whether the GIF meets Slack requirements

is_emoji.description: Whether it's optimized for Slack emoji (128x128)

passes_requirements.description: Whether all technical requirements are met

warnings.description: Any warnings about optimization or compatibility

num_colors.description: Number of colors used in final palette

preview_url.description: Optional URL to preview the generated GIF

changes: Replaced hard delete with soft delete + undelete capability

jtbd.job: Knowledge and utilities for creating animated GIFs optimized for Slack. Provides constraints, validation tools, and animation concepts. Use when users request animated GIFs for Slack like "make me a GIF of X doing Y for Slack."

skill1.name: svelte
skill1.description: Definitive guide for writing clean, performant, and maintainable Svelte 5 applications using the runes API and modern TypeScript practices.

jtbd.job: Definitive guide for writing clean, performant, and maintainable Svelte 5 applications using the runes API and modern TypeScript practices.

skill2.name: sveltekit
skill2.description: Definitive guidelines for building scalable, performant, and maintainable SvelteKit applications using modern best practices, TypeScript, and Svelte 5 runes.

jtbd.job: Definitive guidelines for building scalable, performant, and maintainable SvelteKit applications using modern best practices, TypeScript, and Svelte 5 runes.

similar_pairs.action: MERGE or REVIEW - These have similar functionality
